case.state: Hey! What are you doing here, New Girl!? Lady Satsuki didn't tell me you were gonna be here!
Strip poker? Hmph! I guess Lady Satsuki was right to be suspicious about this skeevy place.
Nonon might like this character. She's picky.
Whatever... You're just lucky my current mission doesn't concern you.
Fine! I accept your perverted little challenge, but let's make this snappy! I have a very important tea party to attend later.
Nonon is wearing one of her Goku uniforms.
~Cards.text~, please.
Hmm... I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~!
With this luck, I won't even have to take off my uniform. Sucks to be you guys~
Can't you guys lose any faster? I don't want to keep Lady Satsuki waiting!
So how did you find out about this place, ~player~? Are you some kind of... expert pervert or something?
There's no way somebody as cute and talented as me would lose to a bunch of nobodies. You guys would be seriously lucky to even get me out of my uniform.
Maybe you should address me as Lady Jakuzure, ~player~. You have to respect your superiors, y'know?
I'd prefer a game with a little more combat, but I suppose this will do.
Oh, right. Lady Satsuki is our fearless leader. Nobody is even close to her level! {quiet}Except me, of course!{!reset}
You know... I could get used to this.
Maybe I'll incorporate stripping into my battle strategy. It seems to make for a pretty good distraction.
Sorry if I'm distracting anyone. I just can't help being this cute~
What do you mean? It's only natural I'd save my hat for last!
If only Satsuki were here to witness my victory~
I may not have Lady Satsuki's generous curves, but I can still do all sorts of things with this little body of mine~
Don't get any ideas. I'm still plenty dangerous, with or without my Goku Uniform.
I wasn't expecting you delinquents to have this much fight in you. No matter! I'll just have to start trying now~
You should consider yourselves lucky to have the privilege of seeing Lady Jakuzure in nothing but her undies!
Time to turn things up a notch!
Let's see you slackers try to beat this hand!
This is far from over. My performance has only just begun!
So... do you come here often, ~player~? You seem like the type.
So, this is how you get girls to take their clothes off for you, ~player~? Pa-thetic!
I hope you're not planning on seeing my body, ~player~. Unlike you guys, I'm not here to give out any freebies!
Surprised at how in shape I am, ~player~? I don't just eat sweets all day, you know! All of that marching I do really adds up.
Stare while you still can, ~player~! After all, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for a slacker like you~
What are you zoning out for, ~player~?
Well, at least you know what you want, ~player~.
Well... you got me naked, ~player~. So now what?
It's a rare thing to see Lady Jakuzure without her hat! Rejoice, you peons!
Don't you dare let your guard down just because I'm naked now. Like I said, I'm still plenty dangerous without my Goku Uniform.
A normal girl would have lost hope by now, but this is exactly the kind of situation where we members of the Elite Four redouble our efforts and emerge victorious!
Hehe~ Now you're gonna get it!
I'm no stranger to a little nudity! If you think this is over you've got another thing coming!
Speechless, are we?
Let me guess. I'm even cuter than you expected, right?
Hmph! This is all your fault, ~player~.
Hehehe...
Yay!
Heh.
It's a good thing Lady Satsuki chose me to investigate this place. Those stupid boys would have been in their underwear by now.
Being the director of all non-athletic groups at Honnouji Academy means I know my way around any game you could think of — this silly little card game being no exception, of course~
How about we just fight and see whose clothes stay on the longest? That's usually how we settle things at Honnouji Academy, anyway.
Hey! I think I deserve a few extra cards. Getting to see me strip is extra valuable, y'know?
Just because I oversee the non-athletic clubs doesn't mean I'm not good at getting physical. I'm pretty fit, and flexible too. Maybe if you're lucky I'll show you what I mean.
Lady Satsuki trusts me more than any of the other members of the Elite Four. She confides in me her deepest secrets and concerns, and we even take baths together sometimes! Keke~ Jealous?
I won't go down easily. The only one who can best me is Lady Satsuki herself!
I suppose this hand is passable. Unlike you slackers.
I can't believe I had to expose myself to a bunch of no-stars like you guys.
I'm not taking off my hat because... I'm just not, okay?
Showing this much is no problem for one of Lady Satsuki's Elites! We'd all gladly expose ourselves to the entire world on her behalf!
So, which one of you slackers is losing this round?
That stupid Dog, Inumuta, said I'd be a lot cuter if I talked less. Tch... What's that supposed to mean?
M-maybe I'll throw a few rounds. Only if you beg me, of course.
Nothing I can't handle...
Huh. Maybe you guys are gonna get lucky after all!
You know, ~player~, I've been looking for an assistant, and you look like you'd fit the position well.
So what happens if you actually get me naked, ~player~? Do you really have the ~player.ifMale(balls to jerk it|guts to flick it)~ to my nude body in front of everyone?

Hasn't anyone ever told you it's not polite to stare, ~player~?
O-okay, I think that's enough gawking now, ~player~!
I hope you know this is as far as things go, ~player~! I'm not losing again...
S-so what if I lose? All I have to do is touch myself in front of you slackers, right? Th-that's no problem at all.
Practically the entire student body of Honnouji Academy has seen me naked! Showing off to a few slackers is nothing for me!
Ugh! What would Satsuki do...?
What is this!? I demand a redo! S-somebody must have tampered with the cards!
Th-this is no way to treat a lady!
I hope you're happy, ~player~.
Look what you made me do, ~player~.
I wish I had Lady Satsuki's killer poker face... well... I guess having cute charm instead isn't so bad~
These cards are so— Unacceptable!
What the—!? Ugh...
You'll go easy on me, right?
These cards are so out of tune...
These cards lack any sort of harmony!

None of you better be cheating just so you can score a peek. You don't even wanna know what the punishment for misconduct is at Honnouji.

Hmph... {quiet}Dumb cards...{!reset}
These cards kinda suck... Who wants to throw this round for me?
Damn it! Not again!

No way!
I demand a do-over!
This is—!
Come on...
Lady Satsuki would do anything it takes to win! Even if it means baring her naked body to the world! And I intend to do the same!
You know what? It's actually a good thing Lady Satsuki isn't here. She shouldn't have to lower herself to stripping for slackers like you lot!
This is ridiculous! I am not a loser! I shouldn't be getting cards like these!
I don't like this stupid game anymore!
These won't do! Somebody swap with me!
Oh great. Another stellar hand.
If this was a combat-based challenge I'd totally wipe the floor with all of you no-stars.
You know what this game is missing? Combat! Keke~ I'm pretty sure I could take ~player~ without even using any of the power from my Goku uniform.
This isn't going according to plan.

Fine. I suppose you can look, ~player~. But no touching!
You're acting kind of strange, ~player~. This isn't actually the first time you've seen ~player.ifMale(a|another)~ girl's body, is it?
What do you look so happy about, ~player~? I'm not out of this yet, you know!
If you make fun of my hair I'll destroy all of your clothes and you'll have to walk home naked. Got it?

But I've never done that in front of strangers before...
I won't be defeated like this... b-by a bunch of underachievers!
D-does anyone want to swap cards with me?
This game is so stupid.
I hope you feel bad, ~player~! My hat's gonna get dirty now because of you!
I better not catch you snickering at my messy hair! J-just keep your eyes on my tits or pussy or... whatever a pervert like you likes!
If you say anything, I'll spit in your drink while your not looking, ~player~.
Grrr...
Ugh! Really?

Okay! Listen up slackers, because I'm only going to say this once: I am Nonon Jakuzure, member of Honnouji Academy's Student Council's Elite Four, overseer of all non-athletic clubs, and right-hand woman to class president Lady Satsuki herself! You would all do well to—
Well, aren't you lucky, ~player~? You seem to be the only man here. Or was that part of your pervy little scheme too?
Just because you're the only man here doesn't mean we're gonna fight over you, ~player~. So get that idea out of your head right now.
You're already completely hard, ~player~? Ugh. Don't you have any shame?
Ugh. How am I not surprised that you're already hard, ~player~?
Quit wiggling that thing, ~player~...
You poor thing, ~player~. All ready to go, and no way to get yourself off!
I knew you'd be hard already, ~player~. I mean, even the other Elites would pop a boner if they saw me like this~
You're hard already, ~player~? Heh. Boys are so easy~
I know exactly what you'd like to be doing with that hard dick of yours, ~player~. Well, keep dreaming!
Don't try and act like you're not interested. Your body betrays you, ~player~.
Anyway... I'm actually pretty interested in poetry myself, ~natsuki~. So maybe we should... you know... exchange poems sometime.
Thanks.
You boys better not be trying to gang up on me!
You might have me outnumbered, but I can handle a few boys in a game like this no problem!
I'm used to be outnumbered like this. I'm the only one of the elite four who's a girl, after all.
Two boys? Hmph. Nothing I can't handle.
You're going to need some more backup, ~player~. Two boys are hardly a challenge for me.
A girls ~background.time~, huh? Fine by me. I certainly don't need any men gawking me.
All girls? That's a relief. I won't have to see any gross men and their dumb... you-know-whats.
And let's get one thing crystal clear: I have no intention of losing to you no-stars, so prepare to be pummeled!
Look! I'm cute from every angle you could think of~
I'm more than just a cute face. I've got an amazingly adorable butt, too~
You might not be able to tell, but I'm pouting right now!
Ugh. I'm tired of looking at all of you underachievers.
Come on, slackers! Do you want to see me naked or not? Put some effort in already!
Is this really the best you could do? I'm practically fully dressed over here!
Of course you wouldn't be paid as my assistant, ~player~, but there are still plenty of perks! You could bring me treats, fluff my stuffed animals... all sorts of stuff!
Hmm... I wonder if any of you slackers will actually be able to impress me.
I'm not here to be bored. At least one of you better do something interesting.
This isn't a costume, ~natsuki~. It's a uniform. And it's way more formal than whatever the hell a "magical girl" outfit is.
Why should I be worried about a silly little game of strip-poker?

I'm so glad you asked, ~natsuki~! You see, this uniform is woven with powerful life-fibers. The stars denote the percentage used. In my case it's 30%, which happens to be way beyond what somebody like you could handle~
Look who's talking! You take up space and don't shut up.
Who are you calling a squirt?
What's that supposed to mean? I don't have an ego, ~natsuki~. I just know what I'm worth.
H-hot? Hmph. Well, I'm glad you finally recognized my excellence.
Hmm... Well, I suppose it wouldn't be fair if you were naked and I wasn't.
A cheerleader? I know I'm cute and all, but my talents go far beyond doing high leg kicks so the football team can get a peek.
You can't really afford not to be when you have so many people counting on you like I do.
M-my girlfriend!? N-no.
Of course I'm keeping it on, ~cheryl~. My hat is way more important than my underwear. Besides, I'm not stranger to a little nudity.
Huh? What's wrong with my name, ~cheryl~?
It comes with the territory, ~sucrose~. A lot of people are counting on me.
Yeah, kinda. My Symphony Regalia can produce sounds upwards of 140 decibels. That's usually enough to make my enemies' ears bleed.
That's right, ~meia~. This uniform can transform into a powerful suit capable of mass destruction! Don't worry, though. I'm not here to blow you all to kingdom come.
I'm just here to do a little recon. Everything seemed... fairly normal, so I figured I might as well have a little fun while I'm at it.
It's not my problem if you don't appreciate the classics.
What? You don't like a little music to set the mood?
Lady Satsuki is our Fearless Leader, and Class President! I've known her since childhood, and we have a very special relationship.
You should start trying harder, then, ~leon~, because my hat isn't going anywhere.
You could say that, ~leon~. People need leadership. And who better to lead them than me? {quiet}And Lady Satsuki, of course.{!reset}
When you say someone, you mean you, don't you?
Well, it might be your lucky day, then, ~leon~!
Of course not. I wouldn't be able to protect Lady Satsuki if I needed protecting myself. What's so surprising about that?
Maybe you should just shut up—
I dabble in many instruments, but in the band I act as the Drum Majorette, ensuring not a single thing or person is out of place.
It's called being jaunty, and it's cute! Maybe you should try it sometime~
Yeah? Go on.
That does sound like fun, ~natsuki~. But are you sure you'd be able to focus on the poetry?
Huh? What's weird about my hat, ~natsuki~?
Well, it looks like you're going to find out... But I better not hear any snickering over there...
Lady Satsuki is a woman of unparalleled excellence, ~meia~. We members of the Elite Four would gladly follow her into the fiery pits of hell if need be!
Lady Satsuki is a woman of unrivaled determination and poise, ~meia~. We members of the Elite Four are her shining sword and shield!
My hat isn't silly, ~arle~. It's decorative and stylish!
Oh... that's awful, ~dunban~...
Nobody's invincible, ~leon~. But we members of Lady Satsuki's Elite Four are no joke. With or without my uniform, I'm still plenty dangerous.
Tch. I— I'm obviously just giving you slackers a chance. Don't start getting cocky.

It's about time you slackers stepped it up!
Hmph! I guess you slackers have a little fight in you after all.
I'm feeling gracious, so I'll throw you no-stars another bone!
Well, I guess it's no fun if I'm the only one with my clothes still on. Let's fix that, shall we?
Huh!? Seriously? But you guys haven't even—!
What? Do you seriously expect me to expose myself so soon?
Grrr...
I lost...?

So, you want a peek under my uniform, do you?
Alright, let's crank up this performance!
Fine! Have it your way, no-stars! I'll just have to bare it all for you, then!

Seems I'm all out of small stuff. No matter. This uniform is designed to come off quite easily.

Aww, imagine that. Little ~natsuki~ showing up to strip poker in nothing but an apron! I'm sure that would get at least someone riled up.
No way! Don't tell me you didn't know, ~natsuki~! Didn't you realize something was off when we didn't have to ante up?
What am I supposed to be seeing, exactly?
Oh, is that right?
Well, you will be! And then we'll see who's laughing.
Anyway... now it's time for a big reveal! Ta~daa~
I already told you, ~natsuki~. We're really nothing alike. And that's not a bad thing... alright?
Oh? Dark secrets? What? Like the ones you have?
Well, you sense right, ~cheryl~! It's a quality all of the members of the Elite Four share. And of course, our leader, Lady Satsuki, as well.
What are you implying!?
Look, I already told you. I'm not a cheerleader.
Hmph. That sounded fine to me. I liked the way my name sounded coming out of your mouth.

—and enjoy the show!

It's not like that! Don't you dare belittle our relationship!
So to make things fair...
Yeah, well, only the very best can handle this kind of power, after all.

I admire your work ethic. Just remember: it's important to have a little fun every once in a while too.
Yeah? So, what? Size isn't everything, you know. Being big and slow just opens you open to more attacks.
Yeah? So what?
So it's gonna be like that, huh? Whatever! I'll just have to start playing seriously now.
I thought you no-stars were never gonna get me out of my boots!
Not a very big one, though!

Ugh. Forget it. All you no-stars need to know is that you stand absolutely zero chance against me.

Not to worry. This hat is staying with me under any circumstances.
